name: Newtonberry CMS
short_description: CMS with emphasis on speed, modularity, looks, ease of extending with 3rd party components.Template are CSS based for total control of look and feel. Support for your choice of MySQL, Interbase, Sybase, PostgreSQL, Oracle,Microsoft SQL server, Foxpro ODB
